description: This file defines a React functional component named Signup, which renders a user registration form with input fields for name, email, and password. It manages local state for form inputs, handles form submission to set user context and navigate to the home page, and includes UI styling and navigation links.
published: default export of the Signup component

methods.name: Signup()
methods.description: React functional component for user signup form with form state management and navigation handling.

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission, sets user data in context, and navigates to the home page.
